title: Standard Geo Location
description: This extension models the physical position of the data using Geometric Figures on the world map. GeoJSON is used for this purpose. It can be determined whether the data should be deleted inside or outside the modeled regions.
$comment: The Interpreter must be able to locate data physically. There may be special cases where parts of the data are located in different countries. Here you have to use the extension several times to cover all possible countries.

scope.description: Time at which the interval stops.
